page.title: 05The school nature garden
page.content: Now it is June 1985 and this is what I wrote; {One June morning. One June morning I was sitting on the outer wall of the nature garden looking and listening. I could see moss over the wall. It is very soft to sit on. There is a tree by the side of me.There is a log it looks smaller than when I was here in May it must be that there is grass growing around it and it is further away or has something come in the night and eaten big chunks out of it?{it could have {been a great big monster.}I can see some flowers in the pond they are white,there are also some flowers by the pond. There are some lovely scarlet poppies dancing in the light breeze. I can hear the birds singing in the trees.I can hear someone sawing it sounds like a mole's feet as
